name: Veggies War
description:
Vegetable chaos has awakened and now each of the vegetables is eager to devour the kitchen world and get to the bread, which will fight off the crazy vegetables and save its existence.

Veggies War - Top Down shooter game in which you have to shoot back from enemies in the form of vegetables, under your control a piece of bread, armed with a special gun and which from room to room learns new abilities!

Game Features:
- Difficulty
- Pixel Art
- Random Rooms
